content: one row of knitting many times repeated equals a lovely stole this light and airy wrap is delightful to make with kidsilk haze that never disappoints two balls of yarn will create a stole of a comfortable length or can still be wrapped around the neck for a warm scarf the pattern is very easy to increase or decrease the pattern repeat is listed this pattern is written only - no chart necessary here what s stopping you grab your yarn and needles why claire i don t know the name just came to me while knitting sometimes you shouldn t ignore those little voices in your head july 9 2012 - wow 16 000 ravelry downloads of claire i hope you have enjoyed this little pattern
